com.powerdata.openpa.tools

Class SpSymFltMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerdata.openpa.tools.SpSymFltMatrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BDblPrime, BPrime

    public class SpSymFltMatrix
extends Object
    Sparse Symmetric matrix with a floating-point value. This class effectively "wraps" a set of adjacencies (LinkNet) created independently. It is intended to allow the same set of adjacencies to be used in multiple matrices...as such no changes are permitted to adjacencies after this object is constructed and initialized.

      • factorize

        public FactorizedFltMatrix factorize(SpSymMtrxFactPattern pat)
        Create a factorized susceptance matrix using a saved pattern Neither the pattern nor susceptance arrays are modified
        Parameters:
        bdiag - diagonal susceptance values (array with size equal to number of buses)
        boffdiag - off-diagonal susceptance values (array with size equal to number of branches)
        Returns:
        factorized susceptance matrix
